mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PJ_TITLE , A.DESCRIPTION , A.FUNDGOAL , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.FUNDERNUM , A.IS_FUNDABLE , A.MAINIMG , A.TEL , A.PJ_EMAIL , A.REFUNDRULE , A.VIDEO_URL , B.RAI_NICKNAME , C.RAISED_FUND FROM FUNDINGPROJECT A LEFT JOIN FUNDRAISER B ON (A.RAISER_CODE = B.RAISER_CODE) LEFT JOIN PROJECTFUND C ON (A.PROJECT_NO = C.PROJECT_NO) WHERE A.PROJECT_NO = #{ no }

SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PJ_TITLE , A.DESCRIPTION , A.FUNDGOAL , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.FUNDERNUM , A.IS_FUNDABLE , A.MAINIMG , A.TEL , A.PJ_EMAIL , A.REFUNDRULE , A.VIDEO_URL , B.RAI_NICKNAME FROM FUNDINGPROJECT A LEFT JOIN FUNDRAISER B ON (A.RAISER_CODE = B.RAISER_CODE) WHERE A.IS_FUNDABLE = 'N' AND A.START_DATE > SYSDATE

SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PJ_TITLE , A.DESCRIPTION , A.FUNDGOAL , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.FUNDERNUM , A.IS_FUNDABLE , A.MAINIMG , A.TEL , A.PJ_EMAIL , A.REFUNDRULE , A.VIDEO_URL , B.RAI_NICKNAME , C.RAISED_FUND FROM FUNDINGPROJECT A LEFT JOIN FUNDRAISER B ON (A.RAISER_CODE = B.RAISER_CODE) LEFT JOIN PROJECTFUND C ON (A.PROJECT_NO = C.PROJECT_NO) WHERE A.IS_FUNDABLE = 'Y'
